# UrlEncodingSettings.HttpUtilitySettings property

Returns a [`UrlEncodingSettings`](../UrlEncodingSettings.md) object that matches the behavior of `HttpUtility.UrlEncode(string)` in .NET 4.

```csharp
public static UrlEncodingSettings HttpUtilitySettings { get; }
```
